646400.name: Postity
646400.description:
Let's Talk About Vr In Vr

Postity is a community for VR enthusiasts - which works alongside your other VR apps.

Join +3,000 Users In Alpha.
Stop using Reddit, Discord, or Facebook groups- to read news about VR. Do it from headset !

Postity will suggest you channels you might be interested in, and will invite your Steam friends to your network - so you will always have new content to watch. Also it starts automatically once Windows boots up - so it's always on, whenever you're in VR.
